ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 395
ygData.msgSnippet: I hear things got real ugly in LOIO the other night when the GMs decided to have fun and spawn a dragon in the zone. So all the unsuspecting lower lvls came in
ygData.messageBody:
I hear things got real ugly in LOIO the other night when the GMs decided to
have fun and spawn a dragon in the zone. So all the unsuspecting lower lvls
came in and got wiped out. it took several guilds to kill the thing. even
some of the higher lvls got killed just zoning in. I wish they would
announce GM events like that in the news thingies when you first are logging
in.
luv,
-Su

> >Thanks for any suggestions and my random ranting
> >about the jerks in LoIO.
>
> LOIO = GFay on crack. Everybody's got 10-15 more
> levels under their belt and the mobs do a little more
> damage so idiocy can be a lot more dangerous. Of
> course, the exp is great and there's plenty of kiting
> room, so I stay...
>
